title: [FEATURE] Updated documentation
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

There are no comprehensive documentations for this project, other then [this](https://mono.github.io/SkiaSharp/index.html), which is still based on an older version with deprecated APIs

### Describe the solution you would like

A clear and concise documentation with plenty of example and proper maintenance.

### Describe alternatives you have considered

Documentation on microsofts website is a joke and just shows the API, besides its based on version 2.88.X.

### Additional context

_No response_

- [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct

Thanks for reporting this. 

It appears we were having issues publishing docs which should now be resolved. 

I have updated both the conceptual docs and the API docs to use the latest version of SkiaSharp.
